amendment.description: Amendment sought to clarify that regulations to protect public health and safety would not be blocked or repealed by H.R. 3010.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 112-296 to clarify that regulations to protect public health and safety would not be blocked or repealed by H.R. 3010.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 242 (Roll no. 884).
